column4: could anyone help with a thread i've started on the forums, rather post here the link than all the details, http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1487921
try nv instead of nvidia with the xcinemajig and see if it is still eating up all the ram ? I dunno how to do that :)

yea that's right -- ok, I was just thinking nv is the one that comes with the system so it might work better with xinerama :P -- good luck
